name: Aces of The Iron Battle: Storm Gamblers In Sky - Free WW2 Planes Game
name_original: Aces of The Iron Battle: Storm Gamblers In Sky - Free WW2 Planes Game
description:
◉ WORLD WAR 2 MULTIPLAYER AIRPLANE GAME! ◉

◉ HUGE EXPLOSIONS! BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS! ◉

◉ FLY AGAINST OTHER ARMY PILOTS AROUND THE WORLD! ◉

It is year 1942 and the world war 2 has started on Pacific Ocean.

Allies and axis are fighting each other for victory in the air.

The sky is filled with airplanes, explosions and shooting!

You mission is to return to aircraft carrier.

You can fly with planes owned by US Army, Japanese Imperial Army air service or German aeronautical army.

The game also has multiplayer! You can fly against real military pilots around the world!

◉ Multiplayer!
◉ Different plane models (Mustang, Spitfire, Luftwaffe, Mitsubishi Zero)
◉ Huge explosions!
◉ Turbo speed!
◉ GameCenter!
◉ Beautiful 3D graphics!
◉ Fun for hours!
◉ Great music!

Are you brave enough to be a navy pilot??!!

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
